original_title: 沓掛時次郎　遊侠一匹
overview: Tokijiro has the unfortunate duty according to the code of the gamblers to join in the fighting when afforded a night’s stay and meals at the home of a town boss. Though he dislikes killing, the strength of his swordsmanship will be tested time and time again in the bloody tale.
title: Kutsukake Tokijiro: The Lonely Yakuza
